info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 2:56PM EST until January 07 at 4:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Lake effect snow with some blowing and drifting snow was still occurring over northern Berrien County. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches are possible bringing total snow accumulations as high as 15 to 22 inches from northern Berrien county into north and west Cass County with lesser amounts elsewhere. * WHERE...Cass and Berrien Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. This warning may need to be extended for an hour or two as a small but heavy snow band lingers over the area. * IMPACTS...Travel will likely continue to be very difficult or impossible in the northern sections of Berrien and northwest Cass County, especially over unplowed roads.
info.instruction: Stay home if you can. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
